titles.title: The Lord is a great god

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come, let us sing unto the Lord,
Let us make a joyful noise
To the Rock of our Salvation,
Come, let us sing unto the Lord,
Let us come before His presence
With thanksgiving in our hearts.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
(For) the Lord is a great God
And a great King above all gods,
In His hands are the land and the sea,
For the Lord is a great God
And a great King above all gods,
In the beauty of His sanctuary
we know His strength and majesty,
The Lord, He is a great God.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Come, let us worship and bow down,
Let us kneel before our Maker,
We're the people of His pasture,
Come, let us worship and bow down
For the Lord, He is our God
We're the sheep of His hand.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
O Lord, You're a great God
And a great King above all gods,
In Your hands are the land and the sea,
O Lord, You're a great God,
You're a great King above all gods,
In the beauty of your sanctuary
We know Your strength and majesty,
O Lord, You are a great God.
